3 namespace Ubiquity\assets;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\themes\ThemesManager;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
7 
18 class AssetsManager {
19  const ASSETS_FOLDER = '/public/assets/';
20  private static $siteURL;
21 
22  private static function gString($template, $variable, $attributes = []) {
23  $implode = UArray::implodeAsso ( $attributes, ' ' );
24  return sprintf ( $template, $variable, $implode );
25  }
26 
27  private static function script($src, $attributes = []) {
28  return self::gString ( '<script type="text/javascript" src="%s" %s></script>', $src, $attributes );
29  }
30 
31  private static function stylesheet($link, $attributes = []) {
32  return self::gString ( '<link href="%s" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" %s>', $link, $attributes );
33  }
34 
41  public static function start(&$config) {
42  $siteURL = $config ['siteUrl'] ?? '';
43  self::$siteURL = rtrim ( $siteURL, '/' );
44  }
45 
53  public static function getUrl($resource, $absolute = false) {
54  if (strpos ( $resource, '//' ) !== false) {
55  return $resource;
56  }
57  if ($absolute) {
58  return self::$siteURL . self::ASSETS_FOLDER . $resource;
59  }
60  return ltrim ( self::ASSETS_FOLDER, '/' ) . $resource;
61  }
62 
70  public static function getActiveThemeUrl($resource, $absolute = false) {
71  $activeTheme = ThemesManager::getActiveTheme ();
72  return self::getThemeUrl ( $activeTheme, $resource, $absolute );
73  }
74 
83  public static function getThemeUrl($theme, $resource, $absolute = false) {
84  if ($absolute) {
85  return self::$siteURL . self::ASSETS_FOLDER . $theme . '/' . $resource;
86  }
87  return ltrim ( self::ASSETS_FOLDER, '/' ) . $theme . '/' . $resource;
88  }
89 
98  public static function js($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
99  return self::script ( self::getUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
100  }
101 
110  public static function css($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
111  return self::stylesheet ( self::getUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
112  }
113 
122  public static function js_($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
123  return self::script ( self::getActiveThemeUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
124  }
125 
134  public static function css_($resource, $attributes = [], $absolute = false) {
135  return self::stylesheet ( self::getActiveThemeUrl ( $resource, $absolute ), $attributes );
136  }
137 }
